gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Panels.Contour.Contours
Class MixedContours

java.lang.Object
  gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Panels.Contour.Contours.Contours
      gov.anl.ipns.ViewTools.Panels.Contour.Contours.MixedContours
All Implemented Interfaces:
IPreserveState
Direct Known Subclasses:
OrderedContours, UnorderedContours
public abstract class MixedContours
extends Contours

Represents a collection of uniformly spaced contour levels unioned with a collection of manually specified contour levels. Subclasses must define exactly how this union is defined and stored.

Constructor Detail

MixedContours

public MixedContours(int numLevels,
                     boolean isOrdered,
                     boolean ignoreRepeats)
Creates an abstract description of this union of contour levels.

Parameters:
numLevels - The number of contour levels in this collection of contour levels.
isOrdered - Indicates if this collection of contour levels is arranged in ascending order.
ignoreRepeats - Indicates if duplicate contour levels in this collection of contour levels are only represented once in the collection.
Method Detail

getIsOrdered

public boolean getIsOrdered()
Used to determine if this collection of contour levels is arranged in ascending order or not.

Returns:
True if this collection is arranged in ascending order and false if no order has been done.

getAreRepeatsIgnored

public boolean getAreRepeatsIgnored()
Used to determine if duplicate contour levels in this collection of contour levels are only represented once in this collection of contour levels.

Returns:
  • True if a contour level may be represented multiple times in this collection of contour levels (if for example it is represented in each collection of contour levels that is part of the union of contour levels that this class represents).
  • False if a contour level will be represented at most once in this collection of contour levels.
